metadata.title: CVE-2023-6706 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in FedCM in Google Chrome prior to 120.0.6099.109 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UI interactionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
